subject: Baseball
NCAA Baseball Championships
lead_paragraph: Danny Hultzen allowed three hits and one run in seven innings and struck out 12 as Virginia routed St. John’s, 10-2, in a winners bracket game in the Charlottesville Regional.
snippet: Danny Hultzen allowed three hits and one run in seven innings and struck out 12 as Virginia routed St. John’s, 10-2, in a winners bracket game in the Charlottesville Regional.
